resources.string: Thank you for using our product. To fully use the system, please go to Settings -> Apps -> My Music Application -> Permissions -> Denied -> Allow access to media only
Oops, there is no song in your list. Please download some to have best experience.
The current song has finished playing. Tap me to open the player!
You need to grant this app permission to read your external storage. This is needed to access your music files.
You rejected the permission request, and the app cannot work without it.You will need to reinstall the app or change this setting manually.
